article.description: SE Louisiana takes care of Langston 92-80
article.headline: SE Louisiana takes care of Langston 92-80
article.linkText: SE Louisiana takes care of Langston 92-80
article.story: NEW ORLEANS -- Joshua Filmore scored 25 points to lead Southeastern Louisiana to a 92-80 victory over Langston on Sunday. Filmore was 8 of 11 from the field and hit all seven of his free throw attempts. Daniel Grieves added a career-high 16 points for SE Louisiana (2-5). Andrew Guillory also had 16, Onochie Ochie 13 and Zay Jackson 12 for the Lions. Curtis Jones led Langston (2-2) with 25 points. Karon Abraham had 15 and Daniel Mulamba 13. Langston, a NAIA member, out-rebounded SE Louisiana 37-29. Andrew Guillory scored nine points and Zay Jackson had seven during SE Louisiana's 20-3 run to close the first half for a 10-point lead. Jones scored seven points in the first 5 minutes after halftime as Langston used a 13-7 run to get within 57-53. Later, SE Louisiana's lead dipped to 64-61 but Filmore scored four during an 8-0 run to lead 72-61 with 11:25 left.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
